explicit

Class IterationMethod.TwoVectorIteration

  • java.lang.Object
    • explicit.IterationMethod.IterationBasic
      • explicit.IterationMethod.TwoVectorIteration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IterationMethod.IterationIntervalIter, IterationMethod.IterationValIter
    Enclosing class:
    IterationMethod

    protected abstract class IterationMethod.TwoVectorIteration
extends IterationMethod.IterationBasic
implements IterationMethod.IterationValIter, IterationMethod.IterationIntervalIter
    Abstract base class for an IterationValIter / IterationIntervalIter that requires two solution vectors. Optionally, a post processing step is performed after each iteration.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected IterationMethod.IterationPostProcessor postProcessor
      Post processing, may be null
      protected double[] soln2
      The solution vector that serves as the target vector in the iteration step

      • doneWith

        public void doneWith(IntSet states)
        Description copied from interface: IterationMethod.IterationValIter
        Notify that the given states are done (e.g., because the given SCC is finished during a topological iteration).
        This allows the two-vector iteration methods to store the current values for these states into the second vector, so that switching the vector does not return to previous values.
        Specified by:
        doneWith in interface IterationMethod.IterationIntervalIter
        Specified by:
        doneWith in interface IterationMethod.IterationValIter
        Overrides:
        doneWith in class IterationMethod.IterationBasic
